briefTitle: Study Evaluating Safety of 13-Valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine in Healthy Elderly Subjects
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Open-Label, Single-Arm Trial Evaluating the Safety, Tolerability, & Reactogenicity of a 13vPnC Vaccine in Ambulatory Elderly Adults Aged 68 Years & Older Who Received 1 or More Doses of 23vPS Vaccine at Least 3 Years Before Study Enrollment
summary: To evaluate the safety of 13-valent pneumococcal conjugate vaccine (13vPnC) in elderly subjects who were vaccinated with one or more doses of 23-valent pneumococcal polysaccharide vaccine (23vPS) at least 3 years before study enrollment.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Pre-specified Local Reactions
